name: Ellen and the Degenerates RPG
detailed_description:
You are a punk rock band from New York City.
You've just finished your debut album and tour starts tomorrow...but someone has stolen your equipment!!
Track down the thieves and defeat anyone who stands in your path to rock and roll glory!!

Ellen and the Degenerates RPG is a turn based RPG battler for Windows and Mac systems.

Features:
MS Paint Graphics.
Ripping soundtrack composed by the band and the games creator.
Hardcore mode for those seeking a challenge.
Animal friends to help you on your journey.
Game probably runs on crappy computers.
Made by me, I play the bass.
Roughly 1 hour of gameplay per playthrough.

Ellen and the Degenerates are a real actual band from New York City. Get to the gig!

short_description: A wonderfully ramshackle game about a rock and roll band and their stolen equipment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Any
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 325 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better.
  • Storage: 325 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains Adult Themes: 
Alcohol, Adult Language
